text: |Relevant Permissions|PA/19/02717 - Demolition of existing buildings, decontamination/remediation of the site and retention (including dismantling, refurbishment and reinstatement) of the two existing gasholder frames to facilitate redevelopment for a mixed- use development comprising 5 buildings ranging between 6-13 storeys to contain 555 residential dwellings and 4,182sqm non-residential floorspace in flexible A1-A4, B1 and D Use Classes.|
